Headline: #J14 Jeffery Jump, #15 Jeffery Local Temporary Northbound Reroute near Jeffery/Anthony
ShortDescription: NB J14 Jeffery Jump, 15 Jeffery Local buses temp. rerouted via Jeffery, Anthony, 85th, South Chicago, and Jeffery due to street blockage near Jeffery/Anthony.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #J14 Jeffery Jump, #15 Jeffery Local buses are temporarily rerouted via Jeffery, Anthony, 85th, South Chicago, and Jeffery due to street blockage near Jeffery/Anthony.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Southbound #3 King Drive buses are temporarily rerouted via King Drive, 67th, State, 69th and King Drive, due to street blockage near King Drive/Marquette.

Headline: #108 Halsted/95 Temporary Reroute near 95th/Eggleston
ShortDescription: 108 Halsted/95 buses temp. rerouted SB: 95th, State, 87th and Halsted; NB: Halsted, 87th, Lafayette and 95th, due to street blockage near 95th/Eggleston.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#108 Halsted/95 buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near 95th/Eggleston, due to street blockage.

Southbound buses will operate via 95th, State, 87th and Halsted.

Northbound buses will operate via Halsted, 87th, Lafayette and 95th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #95 95th, #112 Vincennes/111th Temporary Reroute near 95th/Eggleston
ShortDescription: 95 95th, #112 Vincennes/111th buses temp. rerouted WB: 95th, State, 87th and Halsted; EB: Halsted, 87th, Lafayette and 95th, due to street blockage.
